default.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
default.comment: Default icon color and when paired with default or strong text.

subtle.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
subtle.comment: Use when paired with subtle text colors or inactive actions.

inverse.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
inverse.comment: Inverse color icons (white on dark surfaces, dark on light surfaces)

inverse_on_light.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
inverse_on_light.comment: Dark icons on light backgrounds that do not mode switch.

inverse_on_dark.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
inverse_on_dark.comment: White icons on dark backgrounds that do not mode switch.

disabled.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
disabled.comment: Use for icons paired with disabled text or actions.

brand.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
brand.comment: Use for brand logos and icons paired with primary brand color.

negative.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
negative.comment: Use for icons with negative sentiment, or paired with negative text.

positive.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
positive.comment: Use for icons in a positive sentiment or paired with positive text.

information.scope: Frame Fill, Shape Fill, Stroke Color
